desc: A small flower farm in Lynden growing many flower varieties including Dahlias, Zinnias, Sweet Peas, Bells of Ireland, Strawflowers, Amaranth, etc. Dahlia tubers are available for sale in April, and bouquets from July through October through local venues and a CSA.

layout.text: THE TUBER SALE IS NOW CLOSED.

Thanks for your support!
We will send out all orders the first two weeks in April.
Local orders will be available for porch pick up beginning in April.
Tag us with your blooms #flowerlyfarm
